We have class AppsClient. It likely interacts with an API for managing applications, variants, environments. Methods: add_variant_from_image, create_app, create_app_and_variant_from_template, environment_revisions, get_variant_by_env, list_app_variants, list_apps, list_environments, remove_app. So class responsibility: client for managing apps and their variants/environments via API. }
